text: Phenbenzamine (Antergan) is an antihistamine with anticholinergic properties. ==Synthesis== Phenbenzamine synthesis: Antergan thienyl analog ==See also== *Histapyrrodine *Bamipine *Tripelenamine *Pyrilamine *Chloropyramine == References == Category:H1 receptor antagonists category:Diamines Category:Anilines
title: Phenbenzamine
